interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
Review Date: 2020/02/17
Store: POWERGROOMING
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
Review Text: This has been one of my favorite nail clippers I have used. It cuts with precision, even toenails that are thick or semi ingrown. curvature of clip is wide so it will not clip nails leaving edges, and you do not have to use more than once per nail except toe nail. I also like the little case that does with it and the curved body gives thumb more leverage to hold in place when clipping. It comes with a nail filer but I didn't find much use for it.
Review Title: Strong clipping power, case is great for traveling
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Makeup Blender Sponge Set - 4 Pack Latex Free Q-Soft Makeup Beauty Foundation Blending Sponge Flawless Smooth Brush for Liquid Foundation BB Creams Powders Concealer (4 Pack)
FRESHME
{'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '681413196902', 'Manufacturer': 'FRESHME'}
I like the size and shape of these sponges, specially for application of foundation. I use liquid foundation and I noticed that the sponge was soaking up the makeup. I started using these only to apply powdered makeup like rouge or shimmer and they work very well.
good for powder but not liquid makeup
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
POWERGROOMING
{'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
This has been one of my favorite nail clippers I have used. It cuts with precision, even toenails that are thick or semi ingrown. curvature of clip is wide so it will not clip nails leaving edges, and you do not have to use more than once per nail except toe nail. I also like the little case that does with it and the curved body gives thumb more leverage to hold in place when clipping. It comes with a nail filer but I didn't find much use for it.
Strong clipping power, case is great for traveling
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:**
  - Prefers products for powdered makeup application.
  - Experiences challenges with liquid makeup, particularly regarding product absorption by tools.

- **Product Characteristics:**
  - Values size and shape of makeup applicators, indicating a preference for ergonomic designs that enhance usability.
  - Opts for latex-free materials, suggesting a sensitivity or preference for hypoallergenic options. 

- **Performance Expectations:**
  - Expects makeup tools to efficiently apply makeup without excessive product absorption.
  - Indicates a need for multifunctional products that can be used for different makeup types.

- **Brand Engagement:**
  - Engages with specific brands, pointing towards loyalty or familiarity within certain product ranges.

- **Personal Grooming Preferences:**
  - Demonstrates interest in personal grooming beyond makeup, favoring well-designed tools that offer efficiency and precision, as evidenced by positive experiences with high-quality nail clippers.
  - Appreciates practical features in grooming tools, such as ergonomic design for better control and convenience during use.

Overall, the user maintains a thoughtful approach to both makeup and personal grooming, focusing on practicality, performance, and the efficient application of tools, with a clear preference for products that enhance usability and cater to specific needs.
